title: One stop shame shops
content: decided to start a new thread since this isn't a national chain or very recognizable
author: Michael Surtees

comments.content: There's a foot there? I thought it was the Hawaiian islands...

That "Shoes" in the five toes is really way too classy.   
   
hhp
I noticed the use of brown, a very clever way to suggest that someone stepped in s\*\*\*.

What do expect from a company named "Weiner Shoes"?   
   
Tom

\> I noticed the use of brown, a very clever way   
\> to suggest that someone stepped in s\*\*\*.   
   
   
Well, that can be their selling point!   
   
I can see the slogan now:   
   
"Stepped in s\*\*\*? Get Wener Shoes!"   
   
I can see the Cleo and Addy Awards   
rolling in even now....   
   
(And these people are WORKING. There is no God.)   
   
DT
